thumb.title: [Piki] The Evolution of Recording: From Stone to Blockchain
thumb.description: #piki #pikiworld #lbsns #web3.0 #secure #communication #blockchain #sigmachainNow, the evolution of recording opens a new chapter Web3.0 Blockchain SNS: Pikiworld.Your records, in your hands.Unfading connection.Secure communication.A new kind of social network, one that truly reflects you."You are the true owner of your records."Piki➡️ Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sigmachain.app.piki&pli=1➡️ iPhone https://apps.apple.com/us/app/%ED%94%BC%ED%82%A4-piki/id6447415477➡️ Contact : contact@pikiworld.com ￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣￣ 📢BGM✔️Track - The Road to Your Inspiration - Inspiring Cinematic Music✔️Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon✔️나눔뮤직 - https://tv.naver.com/v/12021211
